verify.name: verify
verify.description: Verify a user by removing the 'Unverified' role and adding the 'Verified' role.

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to verify.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the voice channel

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Set the user limit for your voice channel

options.name: limit
options.description: The user limit for the voice channel (0-99)

allow.name: allow
allow.description: Allow a user to connect to your voice channel

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to allow

kick.name: kick
kick.description: Kick a user from your voice channel

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to kick
